hero.title: [BOLD]Lama Bot[/BOLD][BREAK]Revolutionize Your Website
hero.subtitle: Provide continuous customer support with tailor-made AI in minutes — no coding required

features.title: What Lama Bot Offers
features.subtitle: Reduce your team's workload while ensuring an excellent user experience at all times.

items.title: Virtual Assistant for Customer Support
items.description: Lama Bot recognizes what visitors are viewing and combines that knowledge with information about your products and services to provide accurate, personalized answers.

items.title: Easy Installation
items.description: Customers interact with Lama Bot through a chat window that opens with a button in the corner of the page. It can be integrated quickly without modifying the existing website.

items.title: 24/7 Customer Support
items.description: Lama Bot answers inquiries even outside of your working hours. Customers can get answers to their questions anytime.

items.title: Enhance the User Experience
items.content: Provide instant support, answer queries, and engage your visitors like never before with our intelligent AI assistant.

messages.text: Can you tell me more about your express shipping service?

Absolutely! Our express shipping service ensures your order is delivered within 1-2 business days. It’s available for all products and costs an additional $9.99. If you place your order before 3 PM, we’ll process it the same day. Would you like me to guide you through the checkout process?

items.title: Personalized Responses
items.content: The assistant uses the content of the page the user is viewing and combines it with its knowledge of your products or services to provide appropriate assistance.

messages.text: I'm reading about your fitness programs. Which one would you suggest for someone new to working out?
For beginners, our 'Fit Start Program' is a great choice! It includes guided workouts, nutrition tips, and a 4-week plan to help you ease into fitness. Would you like me to help you sign up?

items.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
items.content: By leveraging the latest AI technology and a robust infrastructure, we ensure fast and reliable performance, providing your visitors with a seamless experience.

messages.text:
Does the Alpine Adventure trip include any activities for families?"
Lama Bot:

Yes, the trip includes family-friendly activities like easy hiking trails, a family picnic by a mountain lake, and a guided nature walk tailored for all ages. There’s also a kid-friendly treasure hunt on one of the stops. Would you like more details on these activities?

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Website Experience?
cta.subtitle: Enter your email address to subscribe to our newsletter and get the latest updates and news.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address.

cookies.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze our website’s performance. Please choose whether to accept or reject non-essential cookies.

apiKey.title: Your API Key
apiKey.tooltip: Use this API key to authenticate your requests to the Lama Bot API. Keep it secure and don't share it publicly.

messages.noSubscription: No active subscription. Select a plan to get the API key.
messages.subscribeToGetKey: No active API key found. Subscribe to a paid plan to get your API key.

files.title: Your Files
files.tooltip: Manage your uploaded files that are used to train your AI chatbot. You can upload documents, delete them, and monitor their processing status.

unsubscribe.subtitle: Enter your email address and we will remove it from our contact list.

chat.initialMessage: How can I help you today? You can ask me anything about the page or you can choose of the predefined personas.

initialAssistants.name: Fitness Assistant
initialAssistants.initialMessage: Hello! Need details on our workout programs, membership options, or opening hours? I’m here to help!

initialAssistants.name: Wristway Ergonomic Assistant
initialAssistants.initialMessage: Hello! I am the assistant for Wristway, a unique ergonomic wrist rest designed to enhance comfort and productivity. Do you need information about Wristway's features, usage, or benefits? I'm here to help!

initialAssistants.name: Shopify Snowboard Assistant
initialAssistants.initialMessage: I'm a shopify assistant, who can get live data from a snowboard store. I can help you with the latest snowboard products, their prices, and availability.

chat.errorMessage: I'm experiencing some technical difficulties. Please try again later.
